titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the treatys of Nycodemus gospell
Gospel of Nicodemus. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Withoute Tempell Barre, in Saynt Clementys parysshe, by me Iulyan Notary dwellynge at the syne of the thre kynges,
publicationStmt.date: In ye yere of our lorde a. M.CCCCC.vii. [1507]]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Marsh's Library, Dublin.
